introduction: This video provides an overview of software architecture in web applications, discussing different architectural patterns and their implications on scalability, reliability, and organizational tools. The speaker covers monolithic, microservice, serverless, and blockchain-based architectures, using YouTube as a real-world example.

sections.title: Section 1: Introduction to Software Architecture
content: Explanation of software architecture as the blueprint for web applications.
Discussion of different types of web applications and their architectural patterns.
Overview of the importance of architecture in scaling, reliability, and organizational tools.
Introduction of the speaker and their expertise in the topic.

sections.title: Section 2: Monolithic Architecture
content: Definition and explanation of monolithic architecture.
Discussion of its advantages and disadvantages in terms of scalability and reliability.
Examples of monolithic applications and their challenges.
Comparison with other architectural patterns.

sections.title: Section 3: Microservice Architecture
content: Definition and explanation of microservice architecture.
Discussion of its advantages and disadvantages in terms of scalability, reliability, and modularity.
Examples of microservice applications and their challenges.
Comparison with other architectural patterns.

sections.title: Section 4: Serverless Architecture
content: Definition and explanation of serverless architecture.
Discussion of its advantages and disadvantages in terms of scalability, reliability, and cost.
Examples of serverless applications and their challenges.
Comparison with other architectural patterns.

sections.title: Section 5: Blockchain Architecture
content: Definition and explanation of blockchain architecture.
Discussion of its advantages and disadvantages in terms of scalability, reliability, and decentralization.
Examples of blockchain applications and their challenges.
Comparison with other architectural patterns.
